title: Dogma is to Worship as Suchness is to Moreness: Value is the Determinant of My Attentional Resources
description:
Karen and Mark tackle 1:42:00 to 2:00:00 of the almost psychedelic conversation between Jordan Peterson and John Vervaeke.

A play list of all ten episodes analyzing this conversation: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLoARw9zo4EUYEEhM_KIgzl_eW9ZZTHbzh

We discuss Deep calling to Deep, the rescue of the Father from the belly of the whale the location of the value structure in John Vervaeke's 4 P's of knowing, Dogma, Credo, Suchness, Moreness, Certainty, Potential, and Worship.

Subscribe for a continuation of this series as well as lots of other great content.
